```{r setup}
library(youthvars)
```
youthvars is a set of tools designed to help describe, summarise and score types of data commonly present in youth mental health collections.

The following vignettes demonstrate some of the tools currently included in the youthvars package:

- [Variable (vector based) classes](V_01.html)
- [Creating descriptive tables and plots](V_02.html)
